name: Totally Accurate Battlegrounds
summary: Totally Accurate Battlegrounds is a parody of the Battle Royale genre. A bunch of physics-based weirdos fight it out on an island, everything is silly and possibly a bit buggy.
info:
• 中文名: 全面吃鸡模拟器
  • 平台: PC
  • 游戏类型: 动作，独立
  • 发行日期: 2018年6月6日
  • 开发商: Landfall
  • 发行: Landfall
